wizard.menu.flow_ops.prompt:
Flow: {flow}
1) View/edit flow summary
2) List steps
3) Add step
4) Update step
5) Delete step
6) Delete flow
7) Save (runs doctor)
0) Back
M) Main Menu
Select operation
wizard.menu.flow_select.title: Select number of flow
wizard.menu.main.prompt:
Main Menu
1) Add flow
2) Edit/delete flows
3) Generate translations
4) Save (runs doctor)
5) Save wizard answers
0) Exit
Select action
wizard.save.empty_flow: Save blocked: a flow must contain at least one step.
wizard.save.dry_run_done: Dry-run complete: flow changes were not written.

Setup mode
1) Default
2) Personalised
